column1: We do not tolerate attacks on police officers or other emergency services. More in the leaflet of the week: http://k.cdu.de/polizistenschuetzen… / ap
@mathiasrichel In contrast to the colleague @jakobmierscheid, the @ KonradAdenauer quotes are all guaranteed. ;) / fb
Dear @KonradAdenauer, thank you very much for the interview!
. @ KonradAdenauer Something personal: One of your grandchildren does fashion, runs boutiques with the name "Adenauer & Co." What do you think of that?
. @ KonradAdenauer Again you were photographed by Papparazzi playing # bowls on your property in Cadenabbia. Do you mind?
. @ KonradAdenauer In the vernacular you are called "the old man", probably in awe of your life's work. In your opinion, is that okay?
. @ KonradAdenauer Germany is in good shape after international crises. How do you assess the situation of our country in global competition?
. @ KonradAdenauer Social media is often misunderstood and serves as a platform for living out personal profile neuroses.
. @ KonradAdenauer Is one more vulnerable online than in a personal conversation?
. @ KonradAdenauer Do you think that social networks are suitable for political communication at all?
Hello Herr @KonradAdenauer! With the social networks, politicians can reach many interested parties with just a few clicks. Would that be something for you?
